dia

Class SWATHStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • dia.SWATHStatistics

  • public class SWATHStatistics
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds a series of utility static method to compute various statistics for SWATH spectra
    Author:
    Jian Wang

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SWATHStatistics() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void getLibraryPepRT()
      Extract RT for library spectra (more legacy format where RT is not a field but part of header)
      static void getLibraryStat()
      Compute similarity of replicate spectra
      static void getLibraryStat2()
      Compute number of peaks in library spectra
      static void getLibraryStat3()
      Compute similarity between library spectra
      static void getPairedModSpectrum()
      Calculate stat on a pair of spectra that differes by PTMs
      static void getRTDifferences()
      Compute stats on the RT difference between library spectra and the identified swath spectra
      static void getS2NR()
      Compute signal to noise ratio of library spectra
      static void getSWATHFiltering()
      Testing different fitering strategy and evaluated them based on the annotated peaks from IDs
      static void getSWATHInterference()
      Compute the stat on interference base on multiple IDs for the same SWATH spectrum
      static void getSWATHRangesFromLib()
      Same as above but using library spectra isntead
      static void getSWATHRangesFromResult()
      Get a list of IDs from SWATH run, divide peptide into precuror m/z bin such that each bin has ~ same number of peptides use to test idea of variable window width of running SWATH
      static int[] histPeakInt(org.Spectrums.Spectrum s, int numBins)
      Perform a histogram on peak intensity in order to estimate signal to noise ratio
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      static void testDeIsotop()
      Test some simple method to remove isotopic peaks
      static void testHistInt()
      Histogram of peak intensity
      static void testProjCosine()
      test if all peaks matched but intensity flat, distribution of projcos
      static void testProjCosineOnSpec()
      Compute projCos similarity statistics on spectra with same IDs on the TOF DDA data
      static void testProjCosineOnSpecDecoy()
      Proj-cos similarity stats on decoy spectra
      static void testSWATHFiltering() 
      static void testSWATHIntensityVar()
      we observe low intensity peaks in SWATH and in general in the 5600 seem to have low variabilty (i.e a flat intensity value across different mass values, compute some statistics on the variability of peak intensity
      static void testSWATHMassVar() 
      static void tofSpecStat()
      Signal peaks stat on tof spectrum
